login.SignInInfo: Enter your email below to login to your account
login.SignUpInfo: Enter your information to create an account

appearance.Title: Appearance
appearance.Description: Customize the appearance of the app.
appearance.ThemeDescription: Select the theme for the App.

errors.unauthorized: Session expired! Please log in again.
errors.serverError: Internal server error! Please try again later.
errors.networkError: Network error! Please check your internet connection.
errors.E101: Unable to parse authorization header string: check encoding.
errors.E102: Authorization header must be of type Bearer.
errors.E103: The token has expired or is invalid. Log in again.
errors.E104: Your email address is not yet validated. Check your emails.
errors.E200: Request does not match the required format. Check the documentation for more information.
errors.E201: Unable to find user by its username. Check spelling.
errors.E202: Unable to find user by its mail. Check spelling.
errors.E205: Unable to save user. Username or mail already in use.
errors.E300: ID is incorrect. The resource may no longer exist.
errors.E301: You do not have permission to access this user.
errors.E400: Unable to save group. Contact admin for more information.
errors.E405: The group does not exist. Check your spelling.
errors.E406: The invitation token has expired or is incorrect.
errors.E500: The room does not exist. Check your spelling.
errors.E601: The plant ID in the path is required. Check the documentation.
errors.E603: You don't have permission to do this. Ask a group member or the room owner.

register.SpecialCharRequired: The password must contain at least one special character (!"#$%&'()*+,-./:;<=>?[]^_{}|~).
register.MinLength: The password must be at least 8 characters long.
